description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called ScoreBar, which displays the current score and the best score in a styled manner with ocean-themed styling. It includes a private widget _ScorePill for displaying individual score indicators.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays current score and best score with custom styling.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: A private stateless widget used within ScoreBar to display individual score data with customized appearance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the ScoreBar widget, consuming game state and building a row of score pills.

methods.name: _ScorePill.build
methods.description: Constructs the pill widget displaying the label and value with styling.
